title: Wilson Fisk/Kingpin Cannot Appear in Movies, Only TV Series, Daredevil’s Vincent D’Onofrio Reveals
description: Don’t expect Vincent D’Onofrio’s name to appear in the second round of Avengers: Doomsday director chairs, or for Kingpin to square off against sometime-adversary Spider-Man on the big screen. To date, D’Onofrio has winningly portrayed Wilson Fisk aka crime boss Kingpin in three seasons of Netflix’s Marvel’s Daredevil… a handful of Disney+’s Hawkeye and Echo […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Casting News: Chi McBride Joins Netflix’s Harlan Coben Series and More
description: Chi McBride is making a promise: I Will Find You. The Hawaii Five-O vet will star opposite Sam Worthington in Netflix’s adaptation of Harlan Coben’s aforementioned novel, our sister site Variety reports. Additionally, Jonathan Tucker (Westworld, Kingdom) has joined the show’s cast, per Deadline. In the limited series, “an innocent father (Worthington) serving life for […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: The Hunting Party Season 1 Epide 10 Spoilers: Who Is Inmate 0?

title: Patrick Ball On The Pitt’s Authenticity, the Importance of Langdon’s Addiction Arc & Paying Homage
description: We caught up with Patrick Ball to discuss The Pitt's authentic storytelling, the importance of the addiction arc, and much more. Check it out! The post Patrick Ball On The Pitt’s Authenticity, the Importance of Langdon’s Addiction Arc & Paying Homage appeared first on TV Fanatic.
